channel.title: Extra coding above "take" item
channel.description: ON a custom item I added in the server there is an extra line with ".." above take item off ground. Where do I fix this. I have a picture attachment below.

item.title: Extra coding above "take" item
item.dc:creator: @dogzound5 dogzound5@gmail.com
item.description:
@dogzound5 wrote:

ok. I am compiling it now :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 01, 2009, 05:29:40 pm[/size][hr]It brought that line up as an error.

item.title: Extra coding above "take" item
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Add this in there:

class8.aStringArray168 = {null, null, "take", null, null};

Read full topic

item.title: Extra coding above "take" item
item.dc:creator: @dogzound5 dogzound5@gmail.com
item.description:
@dogzound5 wrote:

if(i == 13655) // change this if you need to "item number" { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anIntArray156 = new int[9]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[9]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 10266; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 925; class8.anIntArray156[1] = 10275; class8.anIntArray160[1] = 925; class8.anIntArray156[2] = 10291; class8.anIntArray160[2] = 924; class8.anIntArray156[3] = 10283; class8.anIntArray160[3] = 924; class8.anIntArray156[4] = 4550; class8.anIntArray160[4] = 925; class8.anIntArray156[5] = 10287; class8.anIntArray160[5] = 924; class8.anIntArray156[6] = 8375; class8.anIntArray160[6] = 80; class8.anIntArray156[7] = 8384; class8.anIntArray160[7] = 75; class8.anIntArray156[8] = 8367; class8.anIntArray160[8] = 70; class8.anInt174 = 14083; //Model ID // 20233 class8.anInt181 = 1330; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 572; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 302; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = 0; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt165 = 14082;//male wearing // class8.anInt200 = 14082;//female wearing // class8.anInt164 = 14080;//Female arms/sleeves // class8.anInt188 = 14080;//male arms/sleeves // class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Dragone Platebody";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "An ancient custom platebody made by the Dragon Lords.".getBytes();//examin info }

That is the codee in class8.java in the client.
